content.text: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages. HTML is used to structure content on the web, such as text, images, links, and other elements. With HTML, we can define how these elements are displayed in the browser.

content.title: A Piece of Bread on Sunday
paragraphs: In a small village surrounded by green rice fields and an endless blue sky, lived a boy named Raka. He lived with his mother in a simple wooden house. Since his father passed away, his mother had been working as a traveling fried snack vendor to make a living.

Every Sunday morning, Raka would sit in front of the house, waiting for his mother to return from the market. Sunday was a special day—not because there was no school, but because his mother always brought him a piece of bread left over from her unsold goods.
